My only real work experience was as a Waiter. I decided to go with a creative approach and do all I could to stand out. After cutting out Disney pictures, creating the speech bubbles, and heading to a photocopier shop, I sent it to the hiring managers ğŸ«¡ I got offered the job over 2000 other applicants! ğŸ¤¯ To this day, I am still gobsmacked I got it. ANDâ€¦ Iâ€™m sorry to disappoint those asking what the role was like, but I didnâ€™t take itâ€¦ ğŸ«£ I changed my mind and decided to go to university instead ğŸ‘¨ğŸ“ I guess what Iâ€™m trying to say is, donâ€™t be afraid to think outside the box and you might just get your dream job. Imagine if I had taken the job, my life might be looking very different right now ğŸ¤” To everyone creating their CVs and applying to new roles, make sure to stand out from the crowd.
